participant_1.background:
I like to eat at the local diner when I'm studying for my master's degree.
i want to be an explorer.
I am a professional bowler who overcame a broken arm to achieve my dream.
Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes.
I spend my free time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas.

participant_2.background:
I went to Rome and ate a lot of delicious pasta.
I make enough money to support my family and pursue my hobbies.
None of my family members work in the medical field.
No, I prefer to wear comfortable clothes.
I'm constantly tripping over my own feet, but I'm determined to make it as a wedding planner.

content.text: Not much, just preparing to go back to work tomorrow. I work as a wedding planner.
That sounds fun! I hope things go well for you. What are your favorite wedding venues?
I love outdoor venues like beaches, gardens, and parks. They're so beautiful and relaxing.
I agree! I love being outdoors. I'm a professional bowler and I love to spend time in the bowling alley.
That's so cool! I've never been bowling before. What's it like?
It's a lot of fun! You try to knock down as many pins as you can with a ball.
That sounds like a good time. I might have to try it out sometime.
You should! It's a great way to relieve stress.
Thanks for the suggestion! I'll definitely look into it.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go to the movies, and spend time with my family.
Those are all great hobbies! I like to read and go to the movies too.
It sounds like we have a lot in common.
I think so too! We should hang out sometime.
That would be fun! Let's exchange numbers and we can set something up.
